entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. High plus 2.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Tuesday 07 March 2023
